title: Apera Instruments AI1114 pH Calibration Solution Kit (7.00, 4.00), 16 oz. for Each, Plus Apera CalPod Solution Holder, NIST traceable
features: Reported values are accurate to +/- 0.01 pH at 25 °C and are traceable to NIST Standard Reference Materials (SRMs).
Produced in an ISO 9001:2015 certified facility using high-purity reagents, deionized water and certified analytical balances in a temperature controlled environment.
Apera CalPod solution holder is included for organizing all the buffers and streamlining your calibration process.
Double-sealed. 2-year expiration from manufacture for an unopened bottle.
description: Apera Instruments AI1114 pH Calibration Solution Kit (7.00, 4.00), 16 oz. for Each, Plus Apera CalPod Solution Holder. Apera pH calibration buffers are produced in an ISO 9001:2015 facility with ISO 17025:2017 accreditation using high-purity reagents, deionized water and certified analytical balances in a temperature controlled environment. Reported values are accurate to +/- 0.01 pH at 25°C and are traceable to NIST Standard Reference Materials (SRMs). MSDS documents are downloadable. Certificate of analysis can be achieved by request. All pH buffers have a 2-year expiration from manufacture for an unopened bottle.
